tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE production_costs_and_material_usage_reports (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name TEXT,
    material_used TEXT,
    material_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    labor_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE project_material_usage (
    project_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES project_cost_report(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES material_supply(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR,
  project_description TEXT,
  project_start_date DATE,
  project_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR,
  material_cost_per_unit DECIMAL,
  material_quantity_used DECIMAL,
  material_usage_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Printers (
  printer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  printer_name VARCHAR,
  printer_type VARCHAR,
  printer_purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionCosts (
  cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cost_description TEXT,
  cost_amount DECIMAL,
  cost_project_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (cost_project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaterialUsage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  usage_material_id INT,
  usage_project_id INT,
  usage_quantity_used DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (usage_material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (usage_project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
)
